data.name: AboutButtonTooltip
data.comment: Used for about button tooltip

data.name: AboutHeader
data.comment: Used for about flyout header.

data.name: ActiveUserHeader
data.comment: Used for active user header in preferences.

data.name: ArchiveTitleHelperText
data.value: Enter a title for your new Archive.
data.comment: Used for archive title textbox's TextBoxHelper Text.

data.name: CancelButtonContent
data.comment: Used for cancel button content.

data.name: CheckForUpdateAutomaticText
data.value: Automatic check and installation of updates, every time the About page is opened.

data.name: CheckForUpdateText
data.comment: Used for check for update button.

data.name: CheckForUpdateTooltip
data.value: Check for application updates and install them.

data.name: ChooseFolderText
data.comment: Used for choose folder textblock text.

data.name: ConnectButtonContent
data.comment: Used for connect button content.

data.name: ConnectionLostMessage
data.value: Internet Connection lost. Pausing active uploads...

data.name: ConnectionRestoredMessage
data.value: Internet Connection restored. Resuming auto-paused uploads...

data.name: DebugHelpText
data.value: If you're experiencing problems with Deepfreeze.io for Windows, we might ask you to provide a copy of the log. Clicking the button saves the log file on your Desktop as "DFLog.txt".

data.name: DisconnectButtonContent
data.comment: Used for disconnect button content.

data.name: DragAndDropText
data.value: Drag files here to start uploading a new archive
data.comment: Used for drag and drop textblock text.

data.name: EmptyFolderSelection
data.value: The folder you selected is empty.
data.comment: Used for exception message when the user selects an empty folder to archive.

data.name: ForgotPasswordURL
data.comment: Change this for production.

data.name: MinimizedMessageText
data.value: Deepfreeze.io will remain minimized in the tray notification area. To close it, right click the tray icon and select "Exit".

data.name: NoInternetConnectionMessage
data.value: No internet connection found. Please ensure you are connected to a network with Internet access.

data.name: NoUploadsHeaderText
data.value: There aren't any pending uploads from this app.

data.name: PasswordError
data.comment: Used for empty password textblock text.

data.name: PasswordTextboxHelper
data.comment: Used for password login passwordbox.

data.name: PreferencesHeader
data.comment: Used for preferences flyout header.

data.name: QuotaHeader
data.comment: Used for quota header in preferences.

data.name: RestartNeededText
data.value: Click Restart for changes to take effect.

data.name: StatusErrorNotificationText
data.value: There was an error freezing Archive

data.name: TotalArchiveSizeText
data.comment: Used for archive size textblock text.

data.name: UnauthorizedExceptionMessage
data.value: Could not authenticate. Please enter your Deepfreeze.io account credentials.
data.comment: Used for informing the user about wrong username/password combination.

data.name: UploadButtonContent
data.comment: Used for upload button content.

data.name: UpToDateText
data.value: Deepfreeze.io for Windows is up to date.

data.name: UsernameError
data.comment: Used for empty username/email textblock text.

data.name: UsernameTextboxHelper
data.comment: Used for username login textbox.

data.name: DeleteArchiveFromDashboardGenericText
data.value: Please delete the archive using the Deepfreeze.io website Dashboard.
data.comment: Used for displaying a friendly message if there's an error while creating an upload and the returned upload is null.

data.name: ErrorCalculatingS3UploadSizeText
data.value: There was an error calculating the total upload progress.
data.comment: Used for displaying a friendly message if there's an error while calculating the total uploaded size in S3 in the preparing upload phase.

data.name: ErrorCreatingUploadGenericText
data.value: There was an error while creating your upload.
data.comment: Used for displaying a friendly message if there's an error while creating an upload.

data.name: ErrorDeletingUploadGenericText
data.value: There was an error while deleting your upload.
data.comment: Used for displaying a friendly message if there's an error while deleting an upload.

data.name: ErrorPreparingUploadGenericText
data.value: There was an error while preparing your upload.
data.comment: Used for displaying a friendly message if there's an error while preparing an upload (happends once each time the app is started to prepare all the uploads showing in the app, completed or not).

data.name: ErrorRefreshingProgressGenericText
data.value: There was an error while checking your upload's progress.
data.comment: Used for displaying a friendly message if there's an error while refreshing the upload's progress.

data.name: ErrorRemovingUploadGenericText
data.value: There was an error while removing your upload from the application.
data.comment: Used for displaying a friendly message if there's an error while removing an upload.

data.name: ErrorUploadingGenericText
data.value: There was an error with your upload.
data.comment: Used for displaying a friendly message if there's an error while uploading.

data.name: ErrorAddingFilesGenericText
data.value: There was an error adding your file(s) for upload.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if there's an error while adding files to upload via drag n' drop (maybe the user has no right to read the file(s)).

data.name: ErrorCheckingForUpdateWithoutInternetGenericText
data.value: Can't check for updates without an active Internet connection.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if the client tries to check for update without an internet connection.

data.name: ErrorChoosingFolderGenericText
data.value: There was an error loading your folder for upload.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if there's an error while choosing a folder to upload (maybe the user has no right to read the folder).

data.name: ErrorCreatingArchiveGenericText
data.value: There was an error while creating your archive.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if there's an error while creating a new archive (after sending the relevant DF API request).

data.name: ErrorDownloadingUpdateGenericText
data.value: The new version of Deepfreeze.io for Windows cannot be downloaded at this time.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if the client's update cannot be downloaded (maybe the host server is unavailable or the update file is missing).

data.name: ErrorInvalidDeploymentExceptionGenericText
data.value: Cannot check for a new version of Deepfreeze.io for Windows. Please reinstall the application.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if the client installation is not a valid network installation (i.e. the user somehow installed not a valid production setup application) and the check for update fails.

data.name: ErrorInvalidOperationCheckingForUpdateGenericText
data.value: This application cannot be updated. It is likely not a ClickOnce application.
data.comment: Similar to ErrorInvalidDeploymentExceptionGenericText.

data.name: ErrorRefreshingUserStatsGenericText
data.value: There was an error while refreshing your account's information.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if there's an error while getting the user account's information (after sending the relevant DF API request).

data.name: ErrorConnectingGenericText
data.value: There was an error while trying to connect your account.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if there's an error while trying to log in the user account.

data.name: ErrorConnectingWithoutInternetText
data.value: Can't connect your account without an active Internet connection.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if there user tries to log in without an active internet connection.

data.name: ErrorInitializingClientUploadsListGenericText
data.value: There was an error while initializing your uploads.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if there's an error while loading the local client data for the uploads list (maybe the local data files are corrupt).

data.name: ErrorInitializingShellViewModelGenericText
data.value: There was an error while initializing the application.
data.comment: Used for displaying a user friendly message if there's an error while initializing the application (loading local user account data).
